phrases: watashi ga umareta asa no machi yuki no naka ni umoreta
sore wa sore wa chiisai te de aozora wo aoida
sanagara mukashi kara yoku shiru tonari no ano ko no you ni
katahou no mimitabu de kiku sotsugyou no canon
hitori demo daijoubu yo tte mekureteru watashi no story
dareka no sei ni shitai yo
kanashikutte naite bakkari itara me ga tokete nakunatta
aki ni nari mata fuyu ni nari hitotsu toshi wo totta
tooku made nigete iru tsumori demo owaranai kimi no story
sugari nagara oikakete mitemo ashige ni saretemo
My hometown lay buried in snow the morning I was born.
I looked up at the blue sky with my tiny hands.
The face of the girl next door that I have known so well...
It is as familiar as the graduation canon.
Thriving in solitude has been mistaken as my life story.
I want to blame it on someone.
Tears and sorrow caused me to miss my chance.
Autumn passed, winter came again, and I became a year older.
You think you have run far away, but your story never ends.
Even if I have to cling to you, chase after you, and get kicked down...
That event is burned into my eyes and will not go away.
President, it is about the final interview for our new hires...
I would like to hire a guy who can make good curry.
President, cannot you be a little more serious?
The Remote Control Walker is finally complete!
First, you set your easily lost household AC, TV, and VCR remotes on the Remote Control Walker.
Then, you call for it after leaving it somewhere.
Where are you, Mr. Remote Control?!
And, like magic, they gather towards the voice no matter where they are.
I think they are unnecessary if you keep the room clean.
You have always been like that!
You should not skip out on cleaning and You cannot draw eyebrows on a dog face with a marker.
They are basic rules of life.
To begin with, you are screwed up, Tsukasa.
Whenever we slice up a watermelon, you just go and bite the top off every piece.
All the candidates are already here...
You are still bitter about that?
They will quickly realize the true form of the Morita Tech Research Office.
Well then, we will be starting the final interview.
Those of you whose number is called...
Instead of hearing you talk, let us see your abilities.
Please make an airplane using the materials in this room!
I will hire the guy who gets it to fly the farthest!
The time limit is three hours.
I am also forcing all of you to participate!
All right, my sons will enter the battle as well!
If you lose to an elementary schooler, not only will you not get hired, you will be doing ten laps!
This odd company that my father founded was small but lively...
What happened back then is burned into my eyes.
The airplane that flew gracefully through the air...
And the sight of my father's young admirers who were giving it their best.
No one's being hired this year.
I definitely want to work here!
I admire President Morita so much that this is my third try!
And the profile of that person standing next to me, holding a plane that, like mine, would not fly.
He fell into a hole inside the cement factory!
But there were a bunch of Japanese plums...
Dad, we need to get him to the doctor soon...
We are going to go fast!
Kaoru, please go back to the Company and tell everyone that we found Shinobu.
When I was running to get Dad...
I fell on the stone steps at the shrine...
Uncle Negishi was my Dad's childhood friend, best friend, and an important business partner.
So Shinobu got enticed by the Japanese plums and fell into a hole at that abandoned factory.
He is just like your father when he was little.
If a kid in a classroom to the east were sick and absent...
If there were a fight to the north...
He really did whatever he felt like, damn him.
Even so, he was loved by everyone.
He was never afraid of anything.
When he should have have been really scared...
Even though I am so close to him, I still cannot figure it out.
He would be smiling, even if he is the final batter in a losing game.
A pinch only seemed like a chance to him.
He had so much that I did not have.
I was blinded and choked on my own breath so many times.
I always thought that there must be something that only I am capable of.
I always wanted to think that.
Back then, I had not noticed...
That is right, he is all grown up now.
You know Ricchan from the tobacco shop?
I wonder if she will not come marry into our family?
Negishi-san, please be admitted to the hospital right away.
But once I go in, I cannot leave, can I?
I want to work until the end.
There is a reason for me to keep working.
If I die, who will take care of Mom?
Why this world is split between those who are gifted and those who are not?
Why there are those who are loved and those who are not?
Where was the split in the road?
Was there even a split in the first place?
Perhaps it was already decided the moment we were born.
Yes, now about the next topic.
It is about the patent rights for that motor.
I believe it would be better if we placed the company's name instead of the president's name on the patent.
Also, we should gather more funds to expand the factory, so I would like to issue more stocks.
I will leave it up to you.
Please do as you see fit.
I am bad with that sort of thing.
I am counting on you, Tatsuo.
Or, if not, please make me understand that you are from a different world than mine...
The rights to the patent have been completely written over to the company...
We just have to decide what day to make the move.
It must have been difficult to betray your friend.
In return, I will promise that you will see compensation befitting your courage and anguish.
Whether nothing could make it fade...
We should switch to a layout that will yield better productivity.
Dear me, dear me, Mr. Morita.
I am pleased to meet you.
Although your business will now belong to Floyd Electric Corporation...
What is this guy talking about?
I guess I should not even ask.
The talk is probably a waste of time.
Nothing will change about the workplace.
You will be able to freely work on your research under a bigger source of funding.
It is a waste of time.
I love money, but I hate being made to work with someone else's money.
I want to punch your lights out, but I will refrain for today.
I do not want to ask you, but this alone I beg of you.
If you betray my request, I will kill you.
I feel like I can finally go to sleep...
I had not been able to sleep lately for some reason...
But now I feel like I can finally sleep...
Do not do it if you are going to apologize later, idiot.
Again, this contract states that we will be paying you as our employee.
In the event that you pass away, unfortunately, all rights will be transferred to Floyd Electric Corporation.
I will hate you until you die.
I will hate you even if you are reborn a hundred times.
kotoba ga i am about to tsumatte shimattara
If I cannot bring myself to say it...
You two should not hold a grudge.
Do not you ever hold a grudge.
bokura no natsu wa koko de owateshimaisou...our summer together might end right now.
jyouzu ni waraeteru jishin nanka I laughed, even though...
aru wake nai no ni demo waratta...
I had no confidence that I could laugh well.
It is my job to curse and hate him.
Once you put your flattened heels back on...
I will not let you have it.
So you two should move forward.
tame iki wo gutto nomikonde arukidasou...let us swallow our sighs and start walking.
yuugure wo nukete iku kaze wa aki no nioi wo fukunderu
The evening breeze brings in autumn's scent.
zutto kyou to onaji hibi ga negawanakutemo tsudzuku to omotteta I was thinking things would stay the same without having to wish for it...
I have some regrets, but why do not we get going?
akkepanashi no mado no mukougawa de Beyond the open window...
Utilizing the best power motor in this galaxy!
What do you think you are doing?!
Do not let the dark emotions catch up to you.
I cannot run fast like him!
I was always envious of my little brother...
I mean, Dad, I do not have anything.
I also wanted to think that there is something that only I could do...
Get in the bed if you are going to sleep.
I do not have anything else for you to do.
We will send them all to hell.
I wonder if the displays outside will be okay?
It is finally the Hamabi Festival, and this...
I could not even notice it...
There is no way we could have predicted it...
The event that would soon happen...
And the lives that we will lead from here on out...
It would be so much easier...
sorezore no michi wo yuku sono wakaremichi
At the crossroads where we split ways...
mou nidoto au koto no nai deai wa kanashisugiru
Despite adding the emotions that are lacking...
ittai itsumade onaji kotoba wo kakaekondenda
Just how long am I going to brood over the same word?
Next episode: We did not know anything.
